title: Immutable Live Reveal: Scaling NFTs to a Billion Players with L2/L3
description:
Co-Founder & President, Robbie Ferguson and Co-Founder & CTO, Alex Connolly join us to reveal something very important: the next chapter of Immutable.

Tune in to find out what it is and what it means for the NFT space!
